testcase.name: Querying directly to the API Authorization and adding a new entry
testcase.classname: Authorization and adding a new entry

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://api.realworld.io/api/articles/
The response we received from your web server was:
> 422: Unprocessable Entity
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: https://api.realworld.io/api/articles/ Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "Authorization": "Token eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyIjp7ImlkIjo3MTM2fSwiaWF0IjoxNzA2NzI1NjgyLCJleHAiOjE3MTE5MDk2ODJ9.R-xokYyIkBh8cVYWhe5Egu5WQYYqKKLuJPxUfaRUgiA", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/9.5.1 Chrome/94.0.4606.81 Electron/15.3.4 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 92 } Body: {"article":{"taglist":[],"title":"testowanienaekranie2","description":"test","body":"test"}}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 422 - Unprocessable Entity Headers: { "date": "Wed, 31 Jan 2024 18:28:02 GMT", "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8", "content-length": "39", "connection": "keep-alive", "report-to": "{\"group\":\"heroku-nel\",\"max_age\":3600,\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https://nel.heroku.com/reports?ts=1706725682&sid=c46efe9b-d3d2-4a0c-8c76-bfafa16c5add&s=4gtcpoc9cyWnawMb5HcaCWgrRu7C6vwrvKVOrZ6h0fc%3D\"}]}", "reporting-endpoints": "heroku-nel=https://nel.heroku.com/reports?ts=1706725682&sid=c46efe9b-d3d2-4a0c-8c76-bfafa16c5add&s=4gtcpoc9cyWnawMb5HcaCWgrRu7C6vwrvKVOrZ6h0fc%3D", "nel": "{\"report_to\":\"heroku-nel\",\"max_age\":3600,\"success_fraction\":0.005,\"failure_fraction\":0.05,\"response_headers\":[\"Via\"]}", "x-powered-by": "Express", "access-control-allow-origin": "*", "etag": "W/\"27-BNeuaWQ7DHvW/r+pl+qdJiF06Is\"", "via": "1.1 vegur", "cf-cache-status": "DYNAMIC", "server": "cloudflare", "cf-ray": "84e4031aae4935b2-WAW", "alt-svc": "h3=\":443\"; ma=86400" } Body: { "errors": { "title": [ "must be unique" ] } }
https://on.cypress.io/request
